titles.title: Taunton River Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 1999
Taunton River Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2000
Taunton River Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2000

To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate segments of the Taunton River in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts for study for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 106-678.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 381.

action.text: Mr. Souder moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2778.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 6/19/2000--Passed House amended. Taunton River Wild and Scenic River Study Act of 2000 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a specified segment of the Taunton River in Massachusetts for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.Requires the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to Congress on such potential addition.Authorizes appropriations.
